message.body: Are u still planning to go to the ###### tonight? Also... I know it is a long shot but ##### and I are going to Bobby's Burgers tomorrow around 1 for our last burger before her retirement. Any chance you could join us?
Yup, still planning on it! I can't do tomorrow, though :/ Please give ##### my best!
So tonight... It is 6PM at the ######, right? No worries about tomorrow. I thought it would be tough for u to get out during the middle day.
Yup, 6pm. I'll just meet you there
Sounds good. What do u think will happen if it rains?
I'm sure it's somewhere inside, doubt rain will affect it
I'm here! This is so cool. It's straight back in the center of the ######
Class was very nice. Quite relaxing.
And there is FREE wine and beer!
I know!! A friend from out of town is here or I might have stayed :) I like these lectures though
It was really cool. We'll have to discuss it more when I see you.
